snippet: After nearly five hours, the attorney general appeared to emerge unscathed from a contentious hearing on her decision to shut down a yearlong investigation....
abstract: Atty Gen Loretta Lynch offers few detail on investigation into Hillary Clinton's use of personal email server during testimony before House Judiciary Committee, instead repeatedly citing FBI Director James Comey's prior briefing to reporters; committee Republicans call Lynch's refusal to answer abdication of her responsibility and accuse her of stonewalling.
lead_paragraph: After nearly five hours, the attorney general appeared to emerge unscathed from a contentious hearing on her decision to shut down a yearlong investigation.

headline.main: House Panel Questions Loretta Lynch on Hillary Clinton’s Emails
headline.print_headline: Lynch Offers Few Details on Clinton Emails
